<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Ghastly Bear](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1556)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Ghoul" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=218" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 50</row>

**Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +1

**Con** +6

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Stench** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) 10 feet. A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 26 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (plus, on a critical failure, [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) as long as it's sickened). While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +16 

</row>

**HP** 135
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +20,
**Damage** 2d10+9 piercing plus ghast fever and paralysis

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) and paralysis

**Consume Flesh** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The ghastly bear is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour. **Effect** The ghastly bear devours a chunk of the corpse and regains 6d6 Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

**Ghast Fever**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** DC 26 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 3d8 negative damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all [healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=15) (1 day); **Stage 3** as stage 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** 3d8 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); **Stage 5** as stage 4 (1 day); **Stage 6** dead, and rises as a [ghast](/Monsters.aspx?ID=219) the next midnight.

**Mauler**   A ghastly bear gains a +4 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against creatures it has [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20).

**Paralysis**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) Any living creature hit by a ghastly bear's attack must succeed at a DC 26 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

</column>
